promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic special goat dark-type pokemon with white hooves. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cavibex, a a dynamic special goat dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Shadow Cage, Disaster Wing. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "dark" or "Cavibex". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, goat-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Dwelling in cavernous realms, Cavibex deftly maneuvers with its Shadow Cage and Disaster Wing powers, subtly evading predators while emanating enigmatic energy.
